TO CABINETNotifications of Infectious DiseasesNote by the Minister of health i circulate herewith for information a return of notifications of infectious diseases, excluding tuberculosis, during November, 1941.The increase in the incidence of pneumonia, as compared with last month,, isprobably due to the cold weather in the early part of November. The incidence ofmeasles has steadied at a low level.. E.B.Ministry of Health,,'l6tti December, 1941. Notifications for 4 - week periods ending:--.; ... ' "'--r ' "London A.C.
